categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic

nodes.text: The New Tarisian Dawn was a skyscraper on the planet Taris that was built by the Galactic Republic.

The New Tarisian Dawn was an area of the planet Taris that was intended to appear in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. However, the area was plagued by severe memory leaks and graphics errors during the pre-order access week prior to the game's full launch on December 20, 2011. As a result, the New Tarisian Dawn was removed entirely from the game, though the speeder and medical station for the building remained at the northern edge of Taris in the Republic version.
